title: ZAMBOBURGER with Zambos Plantain Originals
ingredients: 6 ounces of shredded or ground puyazo meat
instructions: Step 1: In a bowl place the meat with the mentioned spices. Garlic, cumin, oregano, salt, pepper, black sauce, and coriander. Mix well and make the meatloaf.
Step 2: In a frying pan, place oil and cook the cake to the desired finish. Place ketchup sauce on one of the bread slices. Add lettuce to taste.
Step 3: Place a portion of Zambos Plantain Originals, on top of the avocado, the meat, the cheese and that"s it.
